meta.title: Table
meta.description: For displaying tabular data. <b-table> supports pagination, filtering, sorting, custom rendering, events, and asynchronous data.

events.description: Emitted when a row is clicked.

args.description: Item data of the row being clicked.
Index of the row being clicked.
Native event object.

events.description: Emitted when a row is double clicked.

args.description: Item data of the row being double clicked.
Index of the row being double clicked.
Native event object.

events.description: Emitted when a row is middle clicked.

args.description: Item data of the row being middle clicked.
Index of the row being middle clicked.
Native event object.

events.description: Emitted when a row is right clicked.

args.description: Item data of the row being right clicked.
Index of the row being right clicked.
Native event object.

events.description: Emitted when a row is hovered.

args.description: Item data of the row being hovered.
Index of the row being hovered.
Native event object.

events.description: Emitted when a row is unhovered.

args.description: Item data of the row being unhovered.
Index of the row being unhovered.
Native event object.

events.description: Emitted when a row or rows have been selected.

args.description: Array of the row items that are selected.

events.description: Emitted when a header or footer cell is clicked.

args.description: Column key clicked (field name).
Field definition object.
Native event object.
'True' if this event originated from clicking on the footer cell

events.description: Emitted when the sorting on the table has changed

args.description: Table state context object. See docs.

events.description: Emitted whenever the table state context has changed

args.description: Table state context object. See docs.

events.description: Emitted when local filtering causes a change in the number of items.

args.description: Array of items after filtering (before local pagination occurs).

events.description: Emitted when the items provider function has returned data.

rootEventListeners.description: Refresh data of a specific table when this event is emitted on $root

args.description: table id to refresh data

slots.name: table-caption
slots.description: Content to display in the table's caption element

slots.name: table-colgroup
slots.description: Slot to place custom colgroup and col elements (optionally scoped: columns - number of columns, fields - array of field definition objects)

slots.name: table-busy
slots.description: Optional slot to place loading message when table is in the busy state

slots.name: [field]
slots.description: Scoped slot for custom data rendering of field data. See docs for scoped data

slots.name: HEAD_[field]
slots.description: Scoped slot for custom rendering of field header. See docs for scoped header

slots.name: FOOT_[field]
slots.description: Scoped slot for custom rendering of field footer. See docs for scoped footer

slots.name: row-details
slots.description: Scoped slot for optional rendering additional record details. See docs for Row details support

slots.name: empty
slots.description: Content to display when no items are present in the `items` array (optionally scoped: see docs for details)

slots.name: emptyfiltered
slots.description: Content to display when no items are present in the filtered `items` array (optionally scoped: see docs for details)

slots.name: thead-top
slots.description: Slot above the column headers in the `thead` element for user-supplied rows (optionally scoped: columns - number of TDs to provide, fields - array of field definition objects)

slots.name: top-row
slots.description: Fixed top row slot for user supplied TD cells (Optionally scoped: columns - number of TDs to provide, fields - array of field definition objects)

slots.name: bottom-row
slots.description: Fixed bottom row slot for user supplied TD cells (Optionally Scoped: columns - number of TDs to provide, fields - array of field definition objects)
